title: Six-year-old boy shot
location: In the area of 700 block of E. Sixth St., Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
A 6-year-old boy was critically wounded after being shot in the head during a daytime shooting in Wilmington's East Side neighborhood. 

The child was riding in his 31-year-old mother's vehicle at the time of the shooting. 

Police found them in the 700 block of E. Sixth St. and transported the child to Nemours Alfred I. duPont Hospital for Children and the woman to St. Francis Hospital.

Chelsa Outlaw, 40, of Minquadale-area, has been charged in the shooting.

victims.name: Jashawn Banner
victims.status: Banner was wounded during the incident.
victims.about: Some family members also have spelled the boy's first name as Jashown.

title: Man, 24 shot in Ninth Ward Area
location: In the area of 300 block of W. 29th St., Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
A 24-year-old man was shot in Wilmington's Ninth Ward Area. 

Officers were called to the 300 block of W. 29th St. for a report of shots fired about 9:40 p.m., police said. Responding officers found the victim in the 400 block of W. 29th St. He'd been shot in his lower back and buttocks, an official said.

The man was taken to Christiana Hospital, where he was reported to be stable, an official said.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Two women shot in Hedgeville neighborhood
location: In the area of 1100 block of Read St., Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
Two women were struck by gunfire in Wilmington's Hedgeville neighborhood. 

Multiple emergency responders were called to the 1100 block of Read St. about 11:15 p.m., police said. 

The victims were sitting on the steps of a home when the gunfire erupted, sticking a 40-year-old woman in the upper right leg. She was taken to Christiana Hospital and is listed in stable condition.

The other victim, a 33-year-old woman, suffered a graze wound to her head. She's also in stable condition at Christiana Hospital.

victims.name: Unidentified Woman
victims.status: The unidentified woman was wounded during the incident.

victims.name: Unidentified Woman
victims.status: The unidentified woman was wounded during the incident.

title: Man, 34, critically wounded in Hilltop
location: In the area of 200 block of N. Lincoln St., Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
A 34-year-old man was critically injured following a shooting late Wednesday night in Wilmington's Hilltop neighborhood. 

Investigators found the victim sitting on the steps of a home in the 200 block of N. Lincoln St. just after 11 p.m., an official said. He was wounded in the chest, right arm and lower right leg.  

He was rushed by paramedics to Christiana Hospital for treatment, an official said.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Two shot in West Center City
location: In the area of 400 block of W. Seventh St., Wilmington, DE 19801
summary:
A man and woman were shot Sunday on West Seventh Street.

Shotspotter alerted police to five shots fired in the 400 block of W. Seventh St. about 1:40 p.m. Officers at the scene found two gunshot victims, a 45-year-old man, who'd been shot in the ankle and groin and a 31-year-old black woman, who was grazed on the ankle. 

Both were treated on scene by paramedics and taken to Christiana Hospital.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.
victims.about: Man shot in ankle and groin.

victims.name: Unidentified Woman
victims.status: The unidentified woman was wounded during the incident.

title: Man, 45, found laying on curb
location: In the area of 2900 block of Tatnall St., 2900 Tatnall St, Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
A 45-year-old man was found shot in Wilmington's Ninth Ward area, police reported. 

Officers responded around 10:40 p.m. to the 2900 block of Tatnall St. in regard to a possible shooting victim. Arriving officers found a man laying on the curb suffering from a gunshot wound to his chest area, police said. The victim was treated on scene by New Castle County Paramedics and taken to Christiana Hospital where he was reported to be stable, police said. 

Preliminary investigation reveals that the victim was involved in a verbal argument just prior to the shooting, police said.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Propation officer grazed by bullet
location: In the area of 2700 block of Thompson Place, Wilmington, DE 19802
summary:
A Probation and Parole Officer, who was working with Wilmington Police in the Ninth Ward area was grazed by a bullet. 

The officers were conducting an investigation in the 2700 block of Thompson Place about 10:30 p.m. when they heard gun shots in the area. Police on scene reported that one Probation and Parole officer had sustained a graze wound. 

The officer was taken to Christiana Hospital, where he was treated and released.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.

title: Person shot in Judy Johnson Park
location: In the area of 1600 block of W. Third St., Wilmington, DE 19805
summary:
Wilmington police are investigating a shooting that occurred in Judy Johnson Park. 

Police responded to the 1600 block of W. Third St. for a Shot Spotter alert for seven rounds fired within Judy Johnson Park near the basketball court. Arriving officers were told someone had been hit by gunfire, then fled on foot to St. Francis Hospital. 

The victim was hit once in his right bicep, police said.

victims.name: Unidentified Man
victims.status: The unidentified man was wounded during the incident.
